canvas_sets_y_to_0.rb

Path: bugs/resolved/canvas_sets_y_to_0.rb
Last Update: Sun Mar 14 16:06:06 +0800 2010

As of 7e94d25828021732f7872934cb91430ef798cd86, Document#canvas sets pdf.y to 0 after executing a block, which is probably not useful for anyone. It should retain the y position present at the end of the block.

This was resolved in 998a5c3fad40c9e0a79e1468e3a83815ed948a74 [88]

Required files

prawn/core
